data.message: I would like to ask if it is possible you guys (Facebook) can deactivate an old account that is no longer accessible by the owner. The owner is using different account with almost the same account name. Please message me a soon as possible, thank you

replies.message: Hi Pathen. You can learn more about deleting an old account using the following Help Center article: http://bit.ly/2xUdK92. Hope this helps. -Ashley
The problem is... The owner can't recall or remember any single info that was associated on her old account.
She couldn't even remember the email that was used on her old account
Let me try that one and let you know, thanks

I was so disappointed with you guys by not taking any actions to our request which is to deactivate the old account of my fiance, we already followed the instructions you provided us and yet there was no action until now. Please contact me or my fiance "Mary Jane F Marasigan" about this matter asap
